content: Inspired by this very post I accepted a challenge from my dear mum suggesting I answer an FB post looking for bloggers — it turns out the blog owner really liked my writing (based on Quora subject A2As) and I am now negotiating fees for word count and pitching potential stories. This (writing) is so completely out of my comfort zone… So, thank you for being brave enough to share your stories, goals, dreams, and results with us.
